content: साधक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [साध्-ण्वुल्, सिध्-णिच् ण्वुल् साधादेशः वा <ls>Tv.</ls>] (धका|धिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Accomplishing, fulfilling, effecting, completing. {@--2@} Efficient, effective; <ls>Ku. 3. 12.</ls> {@--3@} Skilful, adept. {@--4@} Effecting by magic, magical. {@--5@} Assisting, helping. --कः A magician, one possessed of supernatural powers, a yogin; <ls>Māl. 5. 1.</ls> --का <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā.
